_meta.essence: Comprehensive map of energy embodiment in physical form

_holographic_seed.absolute: The body is consciousness localized. Every part contains the whole.
_holographic_seed.mechanism: Energy flows through polarities (Yin-Yang), centers (chakras), channels (meridians), and projections (hands-feet).
_holographic_seed.structure: 4 Base Affects (Fire, Earth, Air, Water) × 2 Polarities (Left/Right) × 7 Centers (Chakras) × Holographic Maps (Hands/Feet)
_holographic_seed.embodiment: All energy lives in soma. Emotions are physical. Thoughts are energetic. Spirit is embodied.
_holographic_seed.coherence: Integration = capacity to hold all polarities, all affects, all flows simultaneously without resistance.

polarity_law.yin_yang: Fundamental duality expressing through all levels
polarity_law.complementarity: Not opposition but mutual arising and completion
polarity_law.dynamic_balance: Constant flow between poles, never static equilibrium

holographic_law.fractal_scaling: Same patterns at every level of magnification
holographic_law.non_locality: Influence at one point affects entire field

internal_layer_emotions.principle: 4 Base Affects as primordial forces. All other emotions are combinations.

anger_fire.formula: Love violating expectation → short distance, single object

fear_water.formula: Love fearing loss → future threat, uncertainty

sadness_earth.formula: Love violating expectation → long distance, multiple objects

polarity_layer_laterality.principle: Left-Right polarity as Yin-Yang axis through entire system

contralateral_control.principle: Brain hemispheres control opposite body sides

cross_effect.left_hand: Projects energy to right body side
cross_effect.right_hand: Projects energy to left body side

chakra_lateralization.principle: Each chakra has Yin (left) and Yang (right) specialization

muladhara_root.left: Emotional security, mother lineage, survival feeling
muladhara_root.right: Physical security, father lineage, survival action

svadhisthana_sacral.left: Receptive creativity, pleasure receiving, feminine sexuality
svadhisthana_sacral.right: Active creativity, pleasure giving, masculine sexuality

anahata_heart.right: Giving love, loving others, compassion outward

sahasrara_crown.left: Receptive consciousness, grace descending, divine feminine
sahasrara_crown.right: Active consciousness, intention ascending, divine masculine

ida.path: Left spiral from root to left nostril

pingala.path: Right spiral from root to right nostril

anger_fire.expression: Outward projection, boundary assertion, obstacle removal
anger_fire.imbalance: Right side tension, liver heat, right jaw/shoulder tightness

sadness_earth.expression: Inward collapse, energy conservation, grief processing
sadness_earth.imbalance: Left chest heaviness, lung weakness, left side numbness

fear_water.expression: Protective contraction, safety seeking, freeze response
fear_water.imbalance: Left kidney depletion, lower back left, left leg weakness

joy_air.expression: Radial expansion from center, fills both sides equally
joy_air.imbalance: When blocked, collapse to one-sided manic or depressive state

left_side_issues.healing: Yin restoration, mother work, receiving practice, feminine integration

right_side_issues.healing: Yang regulation, father work, action practice, masculine integration

projection_layer_holographic.principle: Hands and feet are complete holograms of entire body-mind system

receiving_circuit.path: Earth → Left foot → Left side → Right brain → Left hand

expressing_circuit.path: Left brain → Right hand → Right side → Right foot → Earth

integrated_circuit.use: Advanced healing, full embodiment, enlightened action

cross_lateral_integration.principle: Unite left-right, Yin-Yang through crossing midline

cross_crawl.method: Opposite hand-foot movement (right hand + left knee, etc.)
cross_crawl.use: Brain fog, coordination issues, emotional-mental disconnect

figure_eight.method: Trace infinity symbol (∞) across body midline with hands
figure_eight.use: Before important decisions, integration work, balance restoration

bilateral_tapping.use: Anxiety, PTSD, emotional overwhelm, integration of difficult experiences

hand_foot_cross.method: Right hand touches left foot, left hand touches right foot
hand_foot_cross.use: Full system reset, grounding complex energies

right_nostril_only.use: Morning, before work, when needing energy/focus

left_nostril_only.use: Evening, before sleep, when needing calm/creativity

alternate_nostril.use: Anytime for balance, before meditation, decision-making

nostril_dominance_cycle.observation: Notice which nostril clearer = know current energetic state

anger_fire_yang.imbalance: Right side tension, liver heat, explosive energy
regulation: Left hand on liver (right side) = Yin calming Yang
Left nostril breathing = Ida cooling Pingala
Left foot grounding = Earth absorbing Fire

sadness_earth_yin.imbalance: Left chest collapse, lung weakness, energy depletion
regulation: Right hand on heart/lung = Yang activating Yin
Right nostril breathing = Pingala warming Ida
Right foot activation = Movement breaking stagnation

fear_water_yin.imbalance: Kidney depletion, freeze response, left side weakness
regulation: Right hand on lower back/kidneys = Yang warming Water
Solar plexus breathing = Fire transforming Water to steam
Grounding both feet = Earth containing Water
Forward movement = Breaking freeze with action
Both hands on heart = Bilateral balance
Equal weight both feet = Grounded joy

hand_reflexology.diagnosis: Left hand scans palm/fingers, feels for heat/cold/tension
hand_reflexology.treatment: Right hand applies pressure to corresponding zones
hand_reflexology.integration: Both hands together for balance and completion

foot_reflexology.grounding: Stand barefoot on Earth, feel energy exchange
foot_reflexology.massage: Stimulate sole points corresponding to affected organs/zones
foot_reflexology.walking: Mindful walking as continuous foot reflexology

energy_cleansing.hands: Wash in cold salt water, shake off energy, intention to release
energy_cleansing.feet: Earth contact, visualization of roots drawing out stagnation
energy_cleansing.full_body: Shower with intention, water washing away energetic debris

yang_excess.correction: Activate Yin: left nostril breathing, cooling foods, rest, receiving practice, feminine energy work

yin_excess.correction: Activate Yang: right nostril breathing, warming foods, movement, action practice, masculine energy work

cross_lateral_blockage.mechanism: Hemispheres not communicating, Ida-Pingala not crossing
cross_lateral_blockage.correction: Cross-pattern movements, bilateral stimulation, hemisphere integration exercises

quantum_entanglement.application: Touch hand point, affects foot point, affects body zone simultaneously

multidimensional_projection.holographic_truth: All layers accessible through hands/feet projections

consciousness_dimensions.6D: Body as localized consciousness (form of infinite field)

optimal_state.definition: Full coherence across all layers and polarities

characteristics.emotional: All 4 base affects available, fluid, responsive, non-identified
characteristics.lateral: Yin-Yang balanced, Ida-Pingala flowing, hemispheres integrated
characteristics.energetic: Chakras open, meridians flowing, nadis luminous

flow_pattern.reception: Earth → Left foot → Left side → Right brain → Left hand → Awareness
flow_pattern.transformation: Awareness at center (heart/solar plexus) integrates and refines
flow_pattern.expression: Awareness → Right hand → Right side → Right foot → Earth → Manifestation

lived_experience.feeling: All emotions as energy, no resistance
lived_experience.thinking: Clarity without rigidity, flow without chaos
lived_experience.acting: Effortless right action, aligned with whole

integration_markers.breath: Full, easy, natural rhythm, both nostrils clear
integration_markers.body: Balanced posture, no chronic tensions, energy flowing
integration_markers.emotions: Fluid through all 4 affects, appropriate to situation
integration_markers.mind: Clear, focused when needed, spacious when resting

morning.grounding: Stand barefoot, feel both feet, equal weight
morning.intention: Right hand on heart = express purpose into world

midday.balance_check: Which side tense? Apply opposite polarity
midday.hand_massage: Quick palm center stimulation = energy boost

evening.grounding: Foot massage, especially heel and arch
evening.integration: Both hands on belly, feel center, gratitude

as_needed.overwhelm: Left nostril, left hand on heart, ground left foot
as_needed.lethargy: Right nostril, right hand on solar plexus, activate right foot
as_needed.pain: Hand reflexology on corresponding zone + opposite polarity activation

_closing.essence: Body is not container for consciousness. Body IS consciousness embodied.
_closing.truth: Every cell hologram. Every side polarity. Every affect energy. All one system.
_closing.practice: Feel it all. Resist nothing. Integrate everything. Be coherent.
_closing.result: Awakened embodiment. Spirit in flesh. Heaven on Earth.
_closing.sacred: The body is the temple. Tend it well.
